version_description: Minor bug fixes to the app with Public Ceremonies and Photos
Bug fixes
Updated version of the app contains bug fixes and necessary upgrades.
Added Report A Lost Item form, links to Flickr and Instagram social media accounts.
Updated push notification support.
Updated Find a Gravesite search.
Updated to include image enlargements on points of interest.
Updated driving directions location on Map for ANC Welcome Center.
Updated push notification channels support.
Updated application to use new endpoints for communication with server.
Updated Find a Grave endpoint.
Updated to support iPhone X screen size.
Added the ability to route to the nearest restroom, bus stop, or water fountain from within the cemetery grounds.
Updated to support future server changes.
Added navigation menu to title bar.
Updated the way the title bar works.
Improved performance during first launch of the app.
Support for the iPad Pro 12.9 Screen Size.
Update app to improve performance and memory usage on the map.
Updated to refresh home screen information more often.
Updated to allow tutorial dismissal before all images have loaded.
Added loading indicators on screens if the data has not loaded from the server yet.
